TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Charles_Bradley, title = Charles_Bradley, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Bradley} }

S.FORM: Charles Bradley kawas te 1959, byacing te 5 ru 16 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga Maryland, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 196 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 98 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 1981 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu Boston Celtics. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Charles Bradley kawas te 1959, byacing te 5 ro 16 ryax qo hintgan nya, kinholan nya ga Maryland, hiya ga mnanak na ppzoy mari waya, ro sqoliq ka ppkal mari waya. 196 konbon kinwagiq nya, 98 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. kawas 1981 mnwayaw ppzoy mari ga, mzyop sqo te qotox lahoy ro te magal sqoliq, galon nqo Boston Celtics. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
